enhanced_by.reason: Both methods modify the class attribute of elements, making them suitable for setting up similar test conditions.
Both methods modify the class attribute of elements, making them suitable for setting up similar test conditions.
The hasClass method can be used to verify the presence or absence of the class after toggling, making it a suitable assertion method.
The attr method can be used to verify the class attribute directly after toggling, providing a detailed check on the attribute's content.
